name: British Airways Trip Report, A319, Business UK - London Heathrow to Newcastle
description:
This video takes you on a standard UK Domestic flight with British Airways. Using an A319, we get to Newcastle from Heathrow within an hour. The video also includes some highlights from the Galleries First lounge at London Heathrow, which can be accessed using my BA Executive Club Gold Card. 

Please leave a comment below, and subscribe!

You can also follow me on:

Twitter: @pauls_trips

SnapChat: pauls_trips
